summary: A family must come to grips with its culture, its faith, and the brutal political changes entering its small-town world.
cast: Nurul Islam Bablu|Russell Farazi|Jayanto Chattopadhyay|Rokeya Prachy|Soaeb Islam|Lameesa R. Reemjheem|Moin Ahmed|Md. Moslemuddin|Abdul Karim|Shah Alam Dewan|Golam Mahmud|Pradip Mittra Mithun|Auyon Chowdhury|Masud Ali Khan|Manjila Begum|Amena Khatun|Aynal Mia|Nasima Aktar|Abdul Malek|Gurudhan|Nuru Mia Chisty|Shafique|Majibur Rahman|Iman Ali Sarkar|Abdul Kadir|Ibrahim Boyati|Golam Rabbani
title: Matir moina
